alert.note: Alert for Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 1:25PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Larimer County through 215 PM MDT... At 125 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rustic, or 27 miles northwest of Fort Collins, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rustic and Red Feather Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet
